column2: "Meka no nokwar wɔ Kraest mu
column3: minndzi ator
column4: na me tsibowa so regye me dase wɔ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu
column6: "dɛ mowɔ awerɛhow kɛse nye yaw a ɔmmbotow wɔ m’akoma mu."

column2: "Na nkyɛ mepɛ dɛ wɔyɛ mara ebusudze fi Kraest ho
column3: ma mo nuanom a wɔyɛ m’ebusuafo wɔ honam afamu:"

column2: "na wɔyɛ Israelfo a abayɛ no
column3: nye enyimnyam no

column2: "na egyanom no so yɛ hɔndze
column3: na honam afamu so Kraest a ɔyɛ adze nyina do Nyankopɔn a woehyira no daa daa no fi hɔn mu bae no. Amen."

column2: "Na nnyɛ dɛ gyama Nyankopɔn asɛm no ayɛ gyan bi; osiandɛ nnyɛ hɔn a wofi Israel mu nyina nye Israelfo;"
"na eso nnyɛ dɛ wɔyɛ Abraham asefo ntsi na hɔn nyina yɛ mba
column3: na mbom

column2: "Ɔno nye dɛ nnyɛ honam mu mba na wɔyɛ Nyankopɔn mba
column3: na mbom anohoba mba no na wobu hɔn n’asefo."

column2: "Na anohoba no ɔnye asɛm yi
column3: Afedan sisei mebɛba no

column2: "Na nnyɛ dɛm nko
column3: na Rebeka so nye ɔbaako no a ɔno nye hɛn egya Isaak nyinsenii
column6: na wonnyae nnyɛɛ papa anaa bɔn no
column7: mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma Nyankopɔn ne nsanmuyi tsirmpɔw no begyina
column8: na eemmfi ndwuma mu na mbom eefi nyia ɔfrɛ no ntsi no

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw dɛ
column3: Jakob na modɔɔ no

column2: "Dɛm a afei yɛbɛka dɛn? Ana Nyankopɔn ayɛ ayɛmpamu
column3: anaa ɔnntsen? Oho

column2: "Na ɔkaa kyerɛ Moses dɛ
column3: Nyia muhu no mbɔbɔr ara na mubohu no mbɔbɔr
column4: na nyia me yamu hyehye me ma no ara na me yamu bɛhyehye me ama no."

column2: "Ntsi
column3: ommfi nyia ɔpɛ
column5: na ofi Nyankopɔn a ohu mbɔbɔr no."

column2: "Na kyerɛw no se Farao dɛ
column3: Iyi ntsi na memaa wo do
column4: dɛ mibeyi mo tum edzi wɔ wo mu
column5: ama wɔaabɔ me dzin wɔ asaase nyina do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi nyia ɔpɛ na ohu no mbɔbɔr
column3: na nyia ɔpɛ na opirim n’akoma."

column2: "Na bi a ibebisa me dɛ
column3: Dɛm a nna ɔyɛ dɛn na ɔda ho ara hu mfom wɔ nyimpa ho? Woana botum esiw ne pɛ kwan?"

column2: "Ao
column3: nyimpa
column4: woana nye wo na enye Nyankopɔn yiyi nsɛm ano? Ana awendze bɛse ɔwemfo dɛ
column5: Ɔyɛ dɛn na eyɛɛ me dɛm?"

column2: "Ana senaba wemfo nnyi dɛtse do tum dɛ ɔdze dɛtsetɔw kor noara bi wen kɔɔpow a ɔsom bo
column3: na ɔdze bi so wen kor so a ɔnnsom bo?"

column2: "Na dɛ Nyankopɔn repɛ akyerɛ n’ebufuw
column3: na oeyi no tum edzi ntsi
column4: ɔdze abotar pii peen nkorɔfo a woeyi no ebufuw a woesiesie hɔn ama ɔsɛɛ no;"

column2: "na sɛ ɔpɛ dɛ ɔbɛma woehu n’enyimnyam ahonya no so wɔ mbɔbɔrhu a oesiesie ama hɔn a oesiesie ama enyimnyam no so a
column3: yɛbɛka dɛn?"

column2: "Mekyerɛ hɛn a wɔafrɛ hɛn
column3: nnyɛ Jewfo nko
column4: na amanamamfo so bi ka ho."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ ɔka so wɔ Hosea mu dɛ
column3: Mebɛfrɛ dza ɔnnyɛ me man
column5: Na nyia ɔnnyɛ mo dɔfo no

column2: "Na ɔbɛba
column3: dɛ
column6: Hɔn na wɔbɛfrɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn tseasefo no mba."

column2: "Na Isaia so tsea mu wɔ Israel ho dɛ
column3: Sɛ Israelmba dodow tse dɛ mpoano anhwea mpo a

column2: "Na n’asɛm no ne nwiei nye ne tsiatwa ntsi
column3: Ewuradze bɛyɛ iyi wɔ asaase do."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ Isaia kae too hɔ dɛ
column3: Sɛ Dɔm Ewuradze enngya hɛn asefo a

column2: "Ebɛn asɛm na afei yɛbɛka? Dɛ amanamamfo a woenntsiw tsenenee no nsa aka tsenenee a ɔyɛ tsenenee a ofi gyedzi mu;"
"na Israel a otsiiw tsenenee mbra no enndu tsenenee mbra no ho."
"Ebɛnadze ntsi a? Osiandɛ woenndua gyedzi do
column3: na dɛ gyama ofir ndwuma mu. Wofintsiiw fintsiw bo no do
column8: ɔbotan a ɔbɛma nkorɔfo ahwe ase: Na nyia ɔbɛgye no edzi no
